lines.text: Do you know the best way to make a dream come true? Do you? It's to wake up.
Why? Did I beat you? Did I shoot you? In the groin?
How stupid do you think I am, huh?
I once stole a Ferrari with a Chihuahua in the back. He made less noise than you do.
Because I always see the potential of failure.
We can do this the easy way or the hard way.
It's harder... it's harder than the easy way. That's what I know.
I got a Twinkie in the car. It's all yours, if you want it. Just make this call for me.
Yeah, right. That's what I'll do, give my car keys to a car thief.
You don't know where you are, you don't know who I am, and you're cuffed to my bathroom pipe. Honey, don't do me like that.
What do ya gotta go to Knotty Pines for?

So I can meet my man, and tell him "Hey Greg! It's so nice to see you! I just got robbed for $200,000! I enjoyed it!" "Whaaat by who?" "Her uncle!" "Who?" "Her uncle?" I mean, is this science fiction or what?

[Uncle Ray is walking towards them with a gun]
Think he's gonna shoot?
Let's see... we've got rum, tequila and rum... Rum and tequila. What would you like?
You don't have to be drunk to kiss me.
You're a real screwy kid ya know that?
I'm tired of tossing salad, if you know what I mean.
I've known this girl for two days, are you tellin' me I care more about her than you? You son of a bitch! You should've sold her when she was born for cashvalue Mr. Business Man!
Oh, hi Dad, I'm okay but um... Daddy he made me touch his penis.

[Vincent hangs up the phone]
Touch what?

[Emily is cuffed to the sink in the bathroom after beating on Vincent]
What... you're done? You don't wanna play anymore?
